item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, June 22, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. US banking heir gave Trump campaign fund $50mn after ex-president’s conviction
2. [Opinion] Brace for the most distorted election result in British history
3. Hinduja family members sentenced to jail for exploiting domestic staff
4. Wealthy foreigners step up plans to leave UK as taxes increase
5. Keir Starmer: ‘People need hope, but it needs to be realistic hope’
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, June 22, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
